Mera Aur debansh Ka Ek sundar sa kahani bnao | timestamp: 1751778191891

Zaroor, suniye Bhubaneswar aur Devansh ki ek choti si kahani:

Ek shaam, jab suraj dheere-dheere doob raha tha aur aasmaan mein narangi rang bikhar gaya tha, Bhubaneswar apne aangan mein baitha tha. Tabhi uska chhota bhai Devansh, apni choti-choti aankhon mein dher saari jigyasa liye, uske paas daud kar aaya.

"Bhaiya!" Devansh ne haanfte hue pucha, "Agar hum mitti mein chini (sugar) daal dein, to kya kal subah tak wahan se chocolate ka ped ug jaayega?"

Bhubaneswar ko hasi aa gayi. Usne Devansh ko apne paas bithaaya aur kaha, "Chocolate ka ped to nahi, Devansh. Lekin agar hum usme pyaar aur dekhbhaal ka paani roz daalenge, to hamare rishte ka ped zaroor aur bhi meetha aur mazboot ho jaayega."

Devansh ne kuch der socha, phir muskurakar apne bhaiya ke gale lag gaya. Uske liye, uska bhaiya hi uski har atpate se sawal ka sabse meetha jawab tha.
